==Trivia==
* The soundtrack has a similar name to [[Never Ending]], [[Tartaglia]]'s 1st Ascension Passive Talent.
*This track, alongside all other tracks played during fights with Tartaglia's fellow Harbingers, contains a recurring leitmotif.
